Summary: Air Fryer Cauliflower is perfectly tender, crisp and full of amazing flavor. You are going to love how easy it is to make this delicious side dish!
Instructions: Start by cutting the cauliflower into small pieces.
In a small bowl whisk together olive oil, parmesan, paprika, garlic, crushed red pepper and salt and pepper.
Toss the cauliflower with the mixture to coat.
Place in air fryer basket at 390 degrees Fahrenheit for 13-15 minutes or until crispy.
Comments: Lucie says:I can never make them crispy although I really like them.  Dont know what I am doing wrong.  It beats boiled or microwave any time
Teresa Winkle says:This was delicious made this 04/29/23 for supper the only thing a little different was using smoked paprika. 13 minutes at 390 was perfect!!
Vi says:Can you use frozen cauliflower florets?
Alyssa Rivers says:Yes, but I would thaw them and drain any excess water off of them!
Wende says:We loved this.Used Italian seasoning ,garlic powder&Parmesan cheese.
Shelly says:Do you preheat the air fryer or just put the caulif. in and then start at 390?
Alyssa Rivers says:I preheat the air fryer before adding in the cauliflower. Enjoy!!

Lori says:Thanks for the air fryer help. I used a rotisserie basket so I didn’t put the Parmesan on till it was cooked. I’ve never liked cauliflower until tonight. It was excellent. I will try other vegetables this way too.
Rakhinationwide says:Your work is so inspiring. Thanks for the encouragement.
